library.api

Interface LibraryCatalog


  • public interface LibraryCatalog
    An interface representing a virtual library catalog.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addItem(CatalogItem item)
      Add a copy of an item to the catalog.
      CatalogItem getItemById(int id)
      Get and return an item with a specific id.
      int getItemId(CatalogItem item)
      Get the id of an item.
      java.util.List<CatalogItem> getUniqueItems()
      Return a list of all the unique items in the catalog.
      boolean hasItemWithId(int id)
      Test whether an item with the provided id exists in the catalog.
      void removeItem(int id)
      Remove an item from the catalog if possible.
      int size()
      Return the number of unique items in the catalog.

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        int addItem(CatalogItem item)
        Add a copy of an item to the catalog. If a copy of this item already exists, add another copy and return the same id.
        Parameters:
        item -
        Returns:
        the id of this item

      • removeItem

        void removeItem(int id)
        Remove an item from the catalog if possible. Items that are currently checked out may not be removed.
        Parameters:
        id -

      • hasItemWithId

        boolean hasItemWithId(int id)
        Test whether an item with the provided id exists in the catalog.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        true if the item is in the catalog

      • getItemById

        CatalogItem getItemById(int id)
        Get and return an item with a specific id.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        the item

      • getItemId

        int getItemId(CatalogItem item)
        Get the id of an item.
        Parameters:
        item -
        Returns:
        the item's id

      • getUniqueItems

        java.util.List<CatalogItem> getUniqueItems()
        Return a list of all the unique items in the catalog.
        Returns:
        the items

      • size

        int size()
        Return the number of unique items in the catalog.
        Returns:
        the number of unique items
